publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2165.3 Roseanna Cunningham: Proposed Defence Reviews from a Scottish Perspectiveâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-2165) in the name of Murdo Fraser, insert at end "and condemns the fact that these proposals have been developed while Black Watch soldiers and other members of the armed forces are involved in a dangerous conflict in Iraq."
